data.what_is:
BIK (bik.ai) is the most intelligent conversational marketing platform helping E-commerce businesses drive multiple ROI. This platform enables a brand to transact automation with Chatbots, manage multitasking with CRM, create customized broadcasts with campaigns & attain real-time growth insights.

With the vision of creating a customer-centric platform, BIK (bik.ai) is helping various segments of businesses earn an ROI of 137x and empowering businesses worldwide with the slogan of Making Brands Limitless!
data.product_description:
BIK is the most intelligent marketing platform. A powerful tool that helps brands like yours to target, engage and retain your customers, as well as drive higher conversions and increase ROI using conversational marketing.
 It is a revolutionary product built on a mission to make brands limitless - limitlessly big, powerful and successful.

features.name: Data Import & Export Tools
features.content: Ability to input, modify and extract data from the application in bulk through a structured file.

features.name: Integration APIs
features.content: Application Programming Interface - Specification for how the application communicates with other software.  API's typically enable integration of data, logic, objects, etc with other software applications.

features.name: Breadth of Partner Applications
features.content: To what extent are there partner applications readily available for integrating into this product?  Partner applications typically provide complementary, best of breed functionality not offered natively in this product.

features.name: Customization
features.content: System provides sufficient customization to meet business requirements

features.name: Workflow Capability
features.content: Automates a process that requires a series of steps that typically require intervention by a several different users.  Administrators can write rules to determine who and when a user needs to complete a step.  Also includes notification of users when they need to take action.

features.name: User, Role, and Access Management
features.content: Grant access to select data, features, objects, etc. based on the users, user role, groups, etc.

features.name: Internationalization
features.content: Enables users to view and transact business with the same content in multiple languages and currencies.

features.name: Sandbox / Test Environments
features.content: Allows administrators to easily develop and test changes to the CRM deployment.  After changes are made admins can easily migrate the changes into the "live" or "production" environment.

features.name: Performance and Reliability
features.content: Software is consistently available (uptime) and allows users to complete tasks quickly because they are not waiting for the software to respond to an action they took.

features.name: Output Document Generation
features.content: Allows adminstrators to create templates that enable users to quickly generate dynamic documents in various formats based on the data stored in the application.

features.name: Live chat
features.content: Provide tools for live chat on one's website.

features.name: Integrations
features.content: Allows easy integrations with applications, such as messenger applications, APIs, and customer support tools.

features.name: Branding
features.content: Has the ability to customize look and feel of chatbot to match` company branding.

features.name: Analytics
features.content: Gives user the ability to analyze conversations with the chatbot and see its performance.

features.name: A/B testing
features.content: Allows users to test the efficacy of various responses through A/B testing.

features.name: Role-based access
features.content: Allows for varying access to chatbot and admin settings, depending on user, their role, etc.

features.name: Collection of information
features.content: Can collect and store information from interlocators, such as email, phone number, etc.

features.name: Building and Personalizing Emails
features.content: Based on 13 BIK reviews. Create and design emails with an editor; manage templates; personalize dynamically

features.name: Sending Outbound Emails
features.content: Create targeted lists, schedule and manage bulk email sending. This feature was mentioned in 12 BIK reviews.

features.name: Manage Email Deliverability
features.content: Ensure inbox delivery. Includes opt-in management, bounce handling, unsubscribe processing, suppression lists, email preview, spam checking, link validation, and delivery monitoring. This feature was mentioned in 11 BIK reviews.

features.name: Automated Email Responses
features.content: Set up automated nurturing emails based on events, online activities, and lead scores This feature was mentioned in 11 BIK reviews.

features.name: Landing Pages and Forms
features.content: Build customized landing pages and lead capture forms for specific marketing campaigns to maximize conversion and to capture the right qualifying information.

features.name: Dynamic Content
features.content: Dynamically customize emails, forms, and landing pages for specific segments of customers and prospects. 11 reviewers of BIK have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: A/B Testing
features.content: Test alternate versions of emails, landing pages, and forms. Learn what works, maximize response rates, and increase conversion. This feature was mentioned in 11 BIK reviews.

features.name: Mobile Optimized
features.content: Based on 10 BIK reviews. Support mobile-optimized emails, online forms, and landing pages.

features.name: Search Tracking and Optimization
features.content: Track performance of keywords and links in major search engines.  Measure search rankings and performance.  Improve page-level SEO with tools to diagnose and improve page performance.  Integrate with Google AdWords.

features.name: Marketing Lead Database
features.content: A marketing lead database is the system of record for your most important marketing asset: your leads and contacts. Includes a view of all marketing interactions between each prospect and your company, including website visits, email clicks, scoring changes, and data updates/history.

features.name: Data Quality Management
features.content: Data quality consists of deduplication, cleansing, and appending your marketing database.

features.name: Segmentation
features.content: Segment your database and build list of target leads and contacts.  Filter on demographic and company attributes (title, company size, location) as well as behavioral filters and CRM information. 10 reviewers of BIK have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Lead Scoring and Grading
features.content: Automatically qualify and score leads based on demographics as well as prospect online behaviors, including recency and frequency. Assign your own weights to determine lead scores for prioritization.

features.name: Lead Nurturing
features.content: Automate drip marketing campaigns that send relevant messages over time, based on prospect behaviors and pre-defined campaign steps. 10 reviewers of BIK have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Online Behavior Tracking
features.content: Track which emails a prospect opens and clicks, what web-pages they visit, what keywords they use, even what they say on social networks. This feature was mentioned in 10 BIK reviews.

features.name: Automated Alerts and Tasks
features.content: Create tasks automatically and provide real-time sales alerts over email, RSS or mobile device. This feature was mentioned in 10 BIK reviews.

features.name: CRM Lead Integration
features.content: Sync lead, contact, account, and opportunity information with your CRM system. 10 reviewers of BIK have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Program ManagementView full feature definition
features.content: Manage marketing campaigns and programs across multiple channels, including online ads, video campaigns, mobile, virtual events, and social media. Create and optimize program assets such as landing pages, emails, campaigns, and lists. Track program objectives, results, and costs to assess the program ROI. 11 reviewers of BIK have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Event / Webinar Marketing
features.content: Streamline the entire event process, including personalized invitations, registration, reminders, and post-event follow-up.  Integrate with online meeting tools like WebEx, Adobe Connect, GoToWebinar. This feature was mentioned in 11 BIK reviews.

features.name: Calendaring
features.content: As reported in 11 BIK reviews. Maintain a marketing calendar across multiple groups. Manage the calendar for the entire marketing department, from promotions to content to PR.

features.name: Budgeting
features.content: Manage all aspects of marketing investments, including assigning top-down budgets to various groups and divisions, planning marketing spending across programs, tracking open-to-spend, ensuring budget compliance, coordinating work-flows and permissions, and reconciling plans with actual invoices. This feature was mentioned in 11 BIK reviews.

features.name: Social Listening
features.content: Monitor what leads and contacts say on sites such as Facebook, Twitter, YouTube, LinkedIn, blogs, and online communities.  Incorporate into your lead and customer DB and use social insights to segment prospects.  Trigger campaigns, and update lead scores.

features.name: Social Sharing
features.content: Add intelligent social share buttons to your campaigns and content.  Track who is sharing your content and driving conversions.

features.name: Social Campaigns
features.content: Based on 10 BIK reviews. Schedule automated posts to one or more social accounts; use or integrate with URL shortening services; and measure likes, comments, replies, and retweets.

features.name: Social Media Engagement
features.content: Social apps including polls, sweepstakes, and referral programs can enhance audience engagement.  Include these on your website, landing pages, Facebook pages, and emails. This feature was mentioned in 10 BIK reviews.

features.name: Social Media Advertising
features.content: As reported in 10 BIK reviews. Amplify brand and community stories; Reach customers by social profile and activity; Optimize social ad campaigns in real-time

features.name: Basic Reporting
features.content: As reported in 10 BIK reviews. Access pre-built and custom reports and dashboards to measure leads by source/campaign/month, email performance, landing page performance, and web and social activity. Create report subscriptions that can automatically send updates to your team and executives.

features.name: Web Analytics
features.content: Track which pages prospects and customers visit and how often they come back.  Capture the history in database for lead scoring and sales intelligence. Use anonymous company look-up to identify anonymous visitors.  Send alerts to sales reps of which of their prospects and customers web activity. 11 reviewers of BIK have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: ROI Analytics
features.content: As reported in 11 BIK reviews. Measure leads, prospects generated, pipeline, revenue, investment, and ROI by marketing channel or program. The result is that you can see which marketing investments are generating the greatest return and get visibility into how marketing budget should be allocated going forward.

features.name: Revenue Analytics
features.content: Based on 11 BIK reviews. Analyze how leads flow through the funnel by measuring stage to stage conversion rates and velocity.  Allocate pipeline and revenue credit among all the marketing activities that have successfully touched an opportunity as it moves through the pipeline.

features.name: SEO / Keyword Analytics
features.content: Monitor and track how you rank for relevant keywords on major search engines and compare your overall performance to competitors.

features.name: Customization
features.content: Customize your chat workflows with rules and automations.

features.name: Control
features.content: Control who the chatbot converses with (and when).

features.name: Route To Human
features.content: Has the ability to connect interlocator with a human agent when the need arises.

features.name: Menu bars
features.content: Can provide interlocators with menus, through which they can choose a relevant response.

features.name: Drip sequences
features.content: Can send triggered sequence of automated messages sent on a predefined schedule in a targeted fashion.

features.name: Types
features.content: Manages multiple types of social content such as text, documents, videos, and images This feature was mentioned in 10 BIK reviews.

features.name: Migration
features.content: Allows users to migrate content and product data from other systems such as Product information Management (PIM) 10 reviewers of BIK have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Publishing
features.content: Include workflows and rules for content sharing and publishing This feature was mentioned in 10 BIK reviews.

features.name: UGC
features.content: Provide features or integrate with sfotware to manage user-generated content (UGC) This feature was mentioned in 10 BIK reviews.

features.name: Live Streaming
features.content: As reported in 10 BIK reviews. Allows users to live stream content, which can be recorded and replayed on demand

features.name: Omnichannel
features.content: As reported in 10 BIK reviews. Support engagement on multiple channels such as email, phone, and in-store

features.name: Personalization
features.content: Provide pesonalization options such as dynamic templates, localized content, amd recommendations This feature was mentioned in 10 BIK reviews.

features.name: Conversational Commerce
features.content: Provides chatbots and intelligent assistants for conversational commerce This feature was mentioned in 10 BIK reviews.

features.name: Moderation
features.content: Include rules and workflows for moderation of social engagement This feature was mentioned in 10 BIK reviews.

features.name: Promotions
features.content: As reported in 10 BIK reviews. Provide coupons or discounts that are available exclusively on social media

features.name: Shoppable Media
features.content: Manage shoppable content such as images or videos that buyers can click to access a store 10 reviewers of BIK have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: AR/VR
features.content: Based on 10 BIK reviews. Utilize augmented reality (AR) and virtual reality (VR) technology to engage with social media users

features.name: Social Store
features.content: Create social stores and customizable branded landing pages 10 reviewers of BIK have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Product Insights
features.content: Analyze social media sales to determine which products sell better 10 reviewers of BIK have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Social Listening
features.content: Monitor social media interactions to identify consumer trends This feature was mentioned in 10 BIK reviews.

features.name: Campaigns
features.content: As reported in 10 BIK reviews. Track the performance of marketing campaigns and social media advertising

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about BIK?
I am thrilled to share my positive experience with BIK. From the moment I engaged with their services, I was impressed by their professionalism, efficiency, and dedication to customer satisfaction. The team at BIK goes above and beyond to deliver exceptional results. Their attention to detail and commitment to quality are truly commendable. I highly recommend BIK to anyone seeking top-notch products/services and a seamless experience.
Our customer retention has certainly improved and the automations make it all the way more effective for the customers and saves a lot of time and manpower for the team. Special thanks to Flossy, Viv and Sudarshan for being on standby support whenever needed.

Thank you, BIK, for exceeding my expectations!

- Mahima Pandey
Co-founder
Nuts over Mutts

What do you dislike about BIK?
It has multiple features. It would be really helpful if one could get a handy tutorial to explore.

Otherwise the team is kind enough to run through the processes again :)
So no complaints.

What problems is BIK solving and how is that benefiting you?
Helping with the timely follow ups through automations. A customer goes through the whole journey because of automations which make the brand look very professional.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about BIK?
We at Conscious Chemist have found a game-changer in BIK, the WhatsApp, email, and Instagram automation platform. The dynamic team behind BIK consistently delivers valuable insights, promptly incorporating our feedback into new initiatives. Their proactive approach not only enhances customer engagement but also plays a pivotal role in significantly boosting revenue. BIK has become an indispensable asset, helping the way we connect with our audience and drive results in the ever-evolving skincare industry. The time we invest in 'Customer Success' has markedly decreased, thanks to the potent chatbot options and automation flows provided by BIK. These features have proven instrumental in enhancing customer retention for our brand.

What do you dislike about BIK?
There are no significant complaints, aside from occasional dashboard errors.

What problems is BIK solving and how is that benefiting you?
BIK is addressing several key challenges and providing substantial benefits for our operations. The platform's powerful chatbot options and automation flows have significantly reduced the time spent on 'Customer Success' for us. Additionally, BIK has played a crucial role in enhancing customer retention by efficiently handling inquiries and interactions.

initial_reviews.review_title: Our Go-To Solution for Marketing Success
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about BIK?
BIK's user-friendly interface and intuitive design make it incredibly easy to navigate and utilize its powerful marketing automation tools.

What do you dislike about BIK?
BIK offers a robust platform, though mastering it can take some time. One notable issue is the delay in implementing certain feature requests, though the team approaches these with genuine enthusiasm. Additionally, the frequent updates and new features can be overwhelming to keep track of.

What problems is BIK solving and how is that benefiting you?
BIK is addressing the issue of inconsistent messaging across marketing channels by offering omnichannel support, ensuring a cohesive brand experience for customers. This enhances your brand reputation and fosters stronger connections with your audience.

initial_reviews.review_title: Excellent App, Dashboard & Really supportive team
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about BIK?
The support from team is amazing. They resolved my queries within couple of hours whenever I raised them.

What do you dislike about BIK?
I believe the payment system can be improved. More journeys could be added. Right now the customer support is limited to issues raised by customers, instead it should become a customer success team where they work proactively with the customers to create campaigns, improve the ROI by suggesting different templates which are working / not working for other brands.

What problems is BIK solving and how is that benefiting you?
1) Customer support automation
2) Campaign creation on SMS, Whatsapp & Email
3) Automations on SMS, Email & Whatsapp

This saves the time and energy.
